name: C. View Angle
statement:
Flatland has recently introduced a new type of an eye check for the
driver’s licence. The check goes like that: there is a plane with
mannequins standing on it. You should tell the value of the minimum
angle with the vertex at the origin of coordinates and with all
mannequins standing inside or on the boarder of this angle. As you spend
lots of time "glued to the screen", your vision is impaired. So you have
to write a program that will pass the check for you.
